changelog:
BUNNI HOTFIX 2.4.4 R2

Drawing lib
- [+] Re-enabled rendering

Misc Lib
- [-] Fixed `setfflag` and `getfflag` not doing anything
- [-] Fixed fast flag tamper detection issues

Scripts Lib
- [-] Fixed `getsenv`, `getscripthash`, `getthreadfromscript`, `getscriptclosure`, and `decompile` falsely erroring with "script with RunContext set to client expected" in some cases
- [-] Fixed `getscriptclosure` detection that could cause a client modification ban

Actor Lib
- [-] Fixed `runonactor` not working at all & crashing

Reflection Lib
- [-] Fixed `gethiddenproperty` not working for certain property types

Teleport Handler
- [-] Fixed autoexec sometimes not running
- [-] Fixed client staying active in background after closing, causing UI to show "Already Injected!"

Detection Status
- [!] Current detection status is unknown
